data.name: The Messenger Soundtrack - Disc II: The Future [16-Bit]
data.detailed_description:
The Messenger Soundtrack - Disc II: The Future [16-Bit] by Rainbowdragoneyes

1.Ninja's Reprieve (Ninja Village)
2.Hills Of Intent (Autumn Hills)
3.Remembered And Forgotten (Forlorn Temple)
4.Return To The Depths (Catacombs)
5.Bamboo Boogaloo II (Bamboo Creek)
6.Harnessing The Wind (Howling Grotto)
7.The Queendom Of Quills (Quillshroom Marsh)
8.To The Top (Searing Crags)
9.The Frozen Dark (Glacial Peak)
10. The Tower of Time
11. The Shopkeeper
12. Civilization In The Sky (Cloud Ruins)
13. Evil Manfred
14. Know The Way (Dark Cave)
15. The Blue River (Riviére Turquoise)
16. Sacred Grove
17. The Butterfly Matriarch
18. Beneath The Surface (Sunken Shrine)
19. A Hero's Gift
20. Water & Wind (Elemental Skylands)
21. The Clockwork Concierge
22. The Demon's Lair (Underworld)
23. Barma'thazël
24. The Demon King
25. Manfred, the Sky Serpent
26. The Corrupted Future
27. Abomination Beyond Words
28. A Melody To Break The Curse (Music Box)
29. Phantom's Legacy (Final Boss)
30. Staff Roll (End Credits)
